contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
An now, this 7th day of January, 1976, the above captioned matters having been reargued on October 23, 1975, it is unanimously ordered that the opinion of this Court as filed on July 7, 1975, Pa., 341 A.2d 896, be reinstated.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
